title: Stenostephanus laxus
text: Stenostephanus laxus is a species of <a href="plant">plant</a> in the family <a href="Acanthaceae">Acanthaceae</a>. It is <a href="Endemism">endemic</a> to <a href="Ecuador">Ecuador</a>. Its natural <a href="habitat">habitat</a> is subtropical or tropical high-altitude <a href="grassland">grassland</a>. It is threatened by <a href="habitat%20loss">habitat loss</a>.
